title: Hundreds of Thousands March in Israel Against Netanyahu’s Legal Overhaul
description: Netanyahu and allies claim the overhaul is needed to curb what they say are the excessive powers of unelected judges.

title: Spain Pioneered Laws Against Gender-Based Violence. A New Government Could Upend That
description: TIME reports from Valencia, a bellwether of what could come next if the conservative PP forms a government with the far right Vox.

title: Jamie Foxx Tells Fans He is Recovering From an Illness After Being Hospitalized
description: “I went to hell and back, and my road to recovery has some potholes as well, but I'm coming back."

title: Extreme Heat Pushes US Airlines to Shed Fuel and Limit Passengers
description: Allegiant Airlines, a unit of Allegiant Travel Co., said it will delay flights if there’s a threat to passenger safety.

title: Mega Millions Jackpot Grows to $820 Million
description: The potential jackpot is the fifth largest in the history of the game.

title: Extra Time: Well Hello, Sophia Smith
description: The World Cup rookie's spectacular debut

title: Sophia Smith Leads U.S. to Victory in Sensational World Cup Debut
description: With two goals and an assist from 22-year-old rookie Sophia Smith, the U.S. Women’s National Team beat Vietnam 3-0 in their opening match of the 2023 World Cup.
